translation.en: Who's there?
translation.zh: 是谁？

translation.en: Who's there?
translation.zh: 到底是谁？

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.zh: 你们想怎样？

translation.en: [Bella] "Some say the world will end in fire
translation.zh: 有人说 世界将毁灭于火

translation.en: Some say in ice
translation.zh: 有人说会终结于冰

translation.en: From what I've tasted of desire
translation.zh: 作为一个曾尝过欲望滋味的人

translation.en: I hold with those who favor fire
translation.zh: 我也认为是要毁灭于火的

translation.en: But if I had to perish twice
translation.zh: 但如果我必须遭受两次死亡

translation.en: I think I know enough of hate
translation.zh: 我已尝过太多仇恨

translation.en: To say that for destruction ice
translation.zh: 所以 如果真要毁灭 终结于冰也不错

translation.en: Is also great
translation.zh: 终结于冰也不错

translation.en: And would suffice"
translation.zh: 那也已足够

translation.en: You know, I've got an English final.
translation.zh: 我还得准备英语期末考试呢

translation.en: I gotta focus.
translation.zh: 我得专心复习

translation.en: Marry me.
translation.zh:
-嫁给我吧
-不要

translation.en: Marry me.
translation.zh: 嫁给我吧

translation.en: Change me.
translation.zh: 转化我

translation.en: Okay, I will if you marry me.
translation.zh: 如果你嫁给我 我就答应

translation.en: It's called a compromise.
translation.zh: 这叫折衷

translation.en: Let's just call it coercion.
translation.zh: 你这叫胁迫

translation.en: It's not fair.
translation.zh: 这不公平

translation.en: Marriage is just... It's a piece of paper.
translation.zh: 婚姻只不过是一纸证书

translation.en: Where I'm from, it's the way one says, "I love you."
translation.zh:
在我生活的时代
那是表达“我爱你”的方式

translation.en: Well, where I come from, at my age,
translation.zh: 在我生活的时代 在我这个年纪

translation.en: it's the way one says, "I just got knocked up."
translation.zh: 那就意味着“我被人搞大了肚子”

translation.en: So, you're worried about what people will think?
translation.zh: 所以 你是在意周围人的看法

translation.en: You know, two out of three marriages end in divorce.
translation.zh: 三分之二的婚姻都以离婚收场

translation.en: Well, I think you'll find the vampire/human divorce rate
translation.zh:
我觉得 你会发现 吸血鬼和人类结合的婚姻
离婚率会低些

translation.en: is a little lower.
translation.zh:
吸血鬼和人类结合的婚姻
离婚率会低些

translation.en: So marry me.
translation.zh: 嫁给我吧

translation.en: I can't.
translation.zh: 我不能

translation.en: I have to be back at 4:00.
translation.zh: 我4点必须回去

translation.en: Four o'clock on the dot.
translation.zh: 刚好4点

translation.en: That kid trying to brown-nose me now or something?
translation.zh: 那孩子现在是想讨好我吗？

translation.en: He has a name. Now he's too punctual for you?
translation.zh:
他是有名字的
你现在觉得他太准时了吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You understand why you're being punished, right?
translation.zh: 你知道你是为什么被罚的吧？

translation.en: I know, I put you through hell.
translation.zh: 我知道 因为我让你担心得要死

translation.en: Yes, you did.
translation.zh: 没错 确实

translation.en: But I have other reasons for grounding you.
translation.zh: 但我将你禁足还有别的原因

translation.en: Like, uh...
translation.zh: 比如…

translation.en: I just want you to get some separation from him.
translation.zh: 我希望你和他保持距离

translation.en: Dad, there's nothing you can say.
translation.zh: 爸 你无权干涉我们

translation.en: Edward is in my life.
translation.zh: 爱德华是我生命中的一部分

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gathering that.
translation.zh: 是啊 我感觉出来了

translation.en: So, all right, how about this?
translation.zh: 好了 不如这样

translation.en: I'll make you a deal.
translation.zh: 我们来做个交易

translation.en: You're not grounded anymore
translation.zh: 我可以取消你的禁足

translation.en: if you use your new-found freedom
translation.zh:
前提是你重获自由后
必须去见见其他朋友

translation.en: to see some of your other friends, too, like...
translation.zh:
前提是你重获自由后
必须去见见其他朋友 比如 雅各布

translation.en: Like Jacob.
translation.zh: 比如 雅各布

translation.en: He's going through a really tough time right now.
translation.zh: 他如今正在经历一段艰难时期

translation.en: His dad's really worried about him.
translation.zh: 他爸爸很担心他

translation.en: I remember when that was you.
translation.zh: 我还记得你当年像这样时的情况

translation.en: You needed a friend. Jake was there.
translation.zh:
你当时也需要朋友安慰
雅各一直在你身边

translation.en: [on voicemail] Hey, it's Jake. Leave a message.
translation.zh: 你好 我是雅各 请留言

translation.en: [Bella] Jacob hadn't talked to me in weeks.
translation.zh: 雅各布已经好几周不肯跟我说话了

translation.en: I wanted to fix it, he just... He wouldn't give me the chance.
translation.zh:
我想要挽救跟他的友谊
可是他不给我机会

translation.en: You scared me.
translation.zh: 你吓到我了

translation.en: You're going down to the reservation.
translation.zh: 你要去印第安保留地

translation.en: How did you...
translation.zh: 你怎么会知道？

translation.en: Alice.
translation.zh: 是爱丽丝预见的

translation.en: Hey, did you do this to my truck?
translation.zh: 你们连我的车也盯着吗？

translation.en: Bella, you have to understand.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你要理解

translation.en: -Your safety is everything to me. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 你的安全对我来说就是最重要的事

translation.en: Jacob's not gonna hurt me.
translation.zh: 雅各布绝不会伤害我的

translation.en: Not intentionally, but the wolves have no control.
translation.zh: 他不会有意伤害你 但狼人容易失控

translation.en: Edward. I have until graduation to see him.
translation.zh: 爱德华 我只能在毕业前去见他

translation.en: And then I'll be one of you, and he'll hate me forever.
translation.zh:
因为那之后我就会变成吸血鬼
他会永远恨我

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: -Good. Just in time. -Hey.
translation.zh: 来得正好 听听这个

translation.en: [Mike] All right, check it out. All right. Let's see, we got.
translation.zh: 好吧 看你要说什么精彩的事

translation.en: -"My fellow students." Right? -Good. -Cute. -Right? "We are the future.
translation.zh: 同学们 我们是未来的主人

translation.en: Anything is possible, if you just believe."
translation.zh:
只要你相信 -一切皆有可能
-不错

translation.en: -[Angela] Nice. -Blah, blah, blah.
translation.zh:
-一切皆有可能
-不错

translation.en: -[Eric] Perfect. -And you got yourself a speech.
translation.zh:
-好极了
-准备个演讲稿吧

translation.en: No, this'll be my speech
translation.zh:
不 我要是想被大家扔来的
毕业证砸死

translation.en: when I want everyone to throw diplomas at my head.
translation.zh: 才会拿这个当演讲稿

translation.en: So, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢你了

translation.en: You gotta embrace the cliches, Jess.
translation.zh: 你得沿用那些陈词滥调 杰西

translation.en: They are the bread and butter of all valedictorians.
translation.zh:
每个毕业生致辞代表都指望
这些陈词滥调了

translation.en: Hmm. And that is why you are not valedictorian.
translation.zh: 所以你当不了毕业生致辞代表

translation.en: Jess doesn't need cliches.
translation.zh: 杰西不需要这些陈词滥调

translation.en: The speech is gonna be epic.
translation.zh: 你的演讲会一鸣惊人的

translation.en: Epic? It'll change lives.
translation.zh: 一鸣惊人？它会改写人生的

translation.en: I've decided to throw a party.
translation.zh: 我打算开个派对

translation.en: After all, how many times are we gonna graduate high school?
translation.zh: 毕竟高中毕业只有一次

translation.en: A party? At your place?
translation.zh: 开派对？在你家吗？

translation.en: I've never seen your house.
translation.zh: 我从没去过你家

translation.en: No one's ever seen their house.
translation.zh: 从没有人去过他们家

translation.en: Another party, Alice? It'll be fun.
translation.zh:
-又要开派对吗 爱丽丝？
-会很好玩的

translation.en: Yeah. That's what you said last time.
translation.zh: 是啊 你上次也这么说

translation.en: -Hey, Angela. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-嘿 安吉拉
-什么事？

translation.en: Do you need some help with those?
translation.zh: 需要人帮忙吃你拿的这些食物吗？

translation.en: I know you know what she saw. Tell me.
translation.zh:
我知道她把预见的事告诉你了
告诉我

translation.en: It was nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么事

translation.en: You looked worried.
translation.zh: 你看上去很担心

translation.en: Just that everyone noticed how strange Alice is.
translation.zh: 我只是担心大家看出爱丽丝的异常

translation.en: I think that ship sailed long ago.
translation.zh: 我觉得大家早就看出来了

translation.en: I wonder what's wrong.
translation.zh: 我想知道出了什么事

translation.en: [Edward] Their son went missing in Seattle over a year ago.
translation.zh: 西雅图有个人失踪一年多了

translation.en: Charlie's doing what he can, but...
translation.zh: 查理正在想办法 但是

translation.en: You know something about this?
translation.zh: 你是不是知道些什么消息？

translation.en: We've been tracking the situation in Seattle for a while.
translation.zh: 我们一直在关注西雅图的情况

translation.en: Unexplained disappearances. Killings.
translation.zh: 离奇失踪 死亡

translation.en: If the situation gets any more conspicuous,
translation.zh: 如果事态进一步扩大

translation.en: the Volturi will step in.
translation.zh: 沃尔图里家族就会介入

translation.en: If they go to Seattle, they could come here.
translation.zh: 如果他们去西雅图 就有可能来这里

translation.en: They could see I'm still human.
translation.zh: 他们就会发现我还是人类

translation.en: It won't get that far.
translation.zh: 我们不会让事情发展到那一步的

translation.en: But we'll go to Seattle if we have to.
translation.zh: 如果有必要 我们会去西雅图的

translation.en: [Charlie] I'll fax these down, first thing.
translation.zh:
-我会第一时间把这些传下去
-谢谢

translation.en: You ready for dinner?
translation.zh:
-可以去吃晚饭了吗？
-可以

translation.en: It is still just you and I, right?
translation.zh: 就我们父女俩 对吧？

translation.en: No, I'm just dropping her off.
translation.zh: 我不去 我只是送她来而已

translation.en: See you later.
translation.zh:
-回头见
-再见

translation.en: Bella, my parents wanted to remind you about the airline ticket
translation.zh: 贝拉 我父母让我提醒你 别忘了使用你生日时收到的机票礼物

translation.en: you got for your birthday.
translation.zh: 别忘了使用你生日时收到的机票礼物

translation.en: What airline ticket?
translation.zh: 什么机票？

translation.en: A round trip ticket to see Mom in Florida.
translation.zh: 去佛罗里达州看妈妈的往返机票

translation.en: Well... That was generous.
translation.zh: 真大方啊

translation.en: It expires soon, so you might want to use it this weekend.
translation.zh:
很快就过期了
他们建议你这周末用掉

translation.en: Well, I can't just drop everything and go.
translation.zh: 我不能抛下手头的一切就去啊

translation.en: It might be your last chance to see her before you graduate.
translation.zh: 那也许是你毕业前见她的最后机会了

translation.en: [Charlie] Well, might not be a bad idea.
translation.zh: 去看看她倒也不错

translation.en: Get out of town for a couple days. Get some distance.
translation.zh: 离开这里几天 形成一定距离

translation.en: Yeah, I wouldn't mind seeing Mom.
translation.zh: 好吧 我可以去看妈妈

translation.en: As long as you use the companion ticket.
translation.zh: 但你要用情侣票和我一起去

translation.en: Wait. There's two tickets?
translation.zh: 等等 有两张票？

translation.en: Super.
translation.zh: 真“好”啊

translation.en: That makes me really happy.
translation.zh: 真是让我很开心

translation.en: [Bella] I did want to see my mom.
translation.zh: 我确实想去看看妈妈

translation.en: I wanted to know that her life was full and satisfying.
translation.zh: 我想看到她的生活美满幸福

translation.en: [Renee] Aren't you gonna miss this?
translation.zh: 你不会怀念这样吗？

translation.en: Can't you just feel the vitamin D soaking up in your pores?
translation.zh: 阳光洒在身上 补充身体的维他命D

translation.en: Yeah, I am gonna miss this.
translation.zh: 是啊 我会很怀念的

translation.en: You know, colleges in Florida are a lot sunnier.
translation.zh: 佛罗里达的大学要阳光明媚得多

translation.en: I'm just saying, if you go to the University of Alaska,
translation.zh: 我只是说 如果你去阿拉斯加大学

translation.en: I'm never gonna see you.
translation.zh: 我就再也见不到你了

translation.en: They have a really great science program.
translation.zh: 他们有个非常棒的科学项目

translation.en: You mean, Edward program?
translation.zh: 你是说“爱德华项目”吗？

translation.en: The way he watches you,
translation.zh: 他看你的眼神

translation.en: it's like he's willing to leap in front of you
translation.zh: 就好像他会愿意跳到你面前

translation.en: and take a bullet or something.
translation.zh: 为你挡子弹一样

translation.en: Is that a bad thing?
translation.zh: 那不好吗？

translation.en: It's an intense thing.
translation.zh: 那是种炙热的情感

translation.en: You're different with him.
translation.zh: 你和他在一起 也变得不同了

translation.en: He moves, you move. Like magnets.
translation.zh:
他动一下 你也跟着动
就像磁铁一样

translation.en: I don't know, we're just...
translation.zh: 我说不清 我们只是

translation.en: [Renee] In love. I get it.
translation.zh: 深爱着 我明白

translation.en: I just want to make sure you're making the right choices for you.
translation.zh: 我只想确定 你为自己做出了正确的选择

translation.en: You know, 'cause you're the one that's gonna have to live with them.
translation.zh: 毕竟 要和他一起生活的人是你

translation.en: All right, enough with the heavy.
translation.zh: 好了 沉重的话题到此为止

translation.en: Mom. Congraduation.
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-恭喜啊

translation.en: I didn't want you to spend any of your money.
translation.zh: 我不希望你破费

translation.en: Ah, I didn't, come on.
translation.zh: 我没花钱 打开吧

translation.en: -Are these all our old trip T-shirts? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这些是你所有的旧旅行T恤吗？

translation.en: Get out!
translation.zh: 真棒！

translation.en: I saved them all.
translation.zh: 我都留着 可以做一床很好的被子

translation.en: I thought they'd make a good quilt, keep you warm up in Alaska.
translation.zh: 我都留着 可以做一床很好的被子 让你在阿拉斯加也不会冷

translation.en: Remember this one? Ensenada.
translation.zh: 记得这个吗？恩桑那达？

translation.en: -The snake pit. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-蛇窖
-没错

translation.en: But this one is my favorite, here.
translation.zh: 但这个是我最喜欢的 你瞧…

translation.en: The three-headed lobster from Maine.
translation.zh: 缅因州的三头龙虾

translation.en: This is amazing.
translation.zh: 真是太赞了

translation.en: Aw. Honey, I'm glad you like it.
translation.zh: 不 宝贝 我很高兴你喜欢这礼物

translation.en: I just figured, you know, when you get older,
translation.zh: 我在想 等再过几年 你有了孩子

translation.en: have kids, we can add to it.
translation.zh: 我在想 等再过几年 你有了孩子 我们再加上几件 或许去参观一下

translation.en: Maybe go visit the world's largest ketchup bottle or something.
translation.zh: 世界上最大的番茄酱瓶什么的

translation.en: -Thanks. -Oh.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: I'm glad you like it.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你喜欢它

translation.en: Just thought you should have a little piece of me up there in Alaska.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得 你远在阿拉斯加时 就让它代替我陪在你身边 做个念想

translation.en: -Mom... -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-妈妈
-什么事？

translation.en: I miss you. [Renee] Oh, honey, I miss you, too.
translation.zh:
-我想你
-宝贝 我也想你

translation.en: Are you sure this is where you saw her?
translation.zh: 你确定这是你看到她的地方吗？

translation.en: She's almost here.
translation.zh: 她就快到了

translation.en: On your left!
translation.zh: 在你们的左边！

translation.en: Wait! She's in their territory.
translation.zh: 等等 她进入他们的领地了

translation.en: She'll get away!
translation.zh: 她要逃走了！

translation.en: No, she won't!
translation.zh: 她跑不了！

translation.en: [Esme] Emmett, no!
translation.zh: 埃美特 不要！

translation.en: [exhales] Do you regret going?
translation.zh: 你后悔去了吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: It was really great seeing my mom.
translation.zh: 能见到妈妈我很开心

translation.en: Just really hard saying goodbye.
translation.zh: 只是永别真的令我很难受

translation.en: It doesn't have to be goodbye.
translation.zh: 也可以不必是永别的

translation.en: Is that why you asked me to go?
translation.zh: 你就是为此才让我去的吗？

translation.en: You thought I was gonna change my mind?
translation.zh: 你以为我会改变主意

translation.en: I'm always hoping for that.
translation.zh: 我一直是这么希望的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: If I asked you to stay in the car, would you?
translation.zh: 如果我要你留在车里 你会听吗？

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.zh: 当然不会

translation.en: Charlie said you left town.
translation.zh: 查理说你出城了

translation.en: Yeah. To visit my mom. Why?
translation.zh: 是的 去看我妈妈 怎么了？

translation.en: He's checking to see if you're still human.
translation.zh: 他只是想看看你还是不是人类

translation.en: Look, I'm here to warn you.
translation.zh: 我是来警告你的

translation.en: If your kind come on our land again...
translation.zh: 如果你们再敢踏入我们的领地

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: You didn't tell her? Just leave it alone, Jacob.
translation.zh:
-你没告诉她吗？
-别管这事 雅各布

translation.en: Tell me what?
translation.zh: 告诉我什么？

translation.en: Emmett and Paul had a misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 埃美特和保罗有点误会

translation.en: It's nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 没什么好担心的

translation.en: [Jacob] Listen to you.
translation.zh: 听听你说话的口气

translation.en: Did you lie to get her out of town, too?
translation.zh: 你是不是用谎言把她骗出城的？

translation.en: You should just leave. Now.
translation.zh: 你该走了 立刻

translation.en: She has a right to know.
translation.zh: 她有权利知道

translation.en: She is the one the redhead wants.
translation.zh: 她是红发吸血鬼要抓的那个

translation.en: Victoria?
translation.zh: 维多利亚吗？

translation.en: Alice's vision.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝预见的是她

translation.en: I was trying to protect you.
translation.zh: 我是想要保护你

translation.en: By lying to me.
translation.zh: 是通过撒谎来保护我

translation.en: Okay, we're gonna talk about this, but...
translation.zh: 好吧 我们以后再谈这个 可是…

translation.en: You.
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: Why haven't you called me back?
translation.zh: 你为什么不回我电话？

translation.en: I had nothing to say.
translation.zh: 我无话可说

translation.en: Well, I have tons. Hold on.
translation.zh:
-但我有好多话要说 等等
-嘿

translation.en: Bella.
translation.zh: 贝拉

translation.en: Edward, you have to trust me.
translation.zh: 爱德华 你要相信我

translation.en: I do trust you.
translation.zh: 我相信你

translation.en: It's him I don't trust.
translation.zh: 可我不信他

translation.en: Hey, lose the grin, Jacob. We're just going for a ride.
translation.zh:
别坏笑了 雅各布
我们只是兜个风而已

translation.en: Hold on tight.
translation.zh: 抱稳了

translation.en: Are you sure this is a good idea?
translation.zh: 你确定这样好吗？

translation.en: I am the vampire girl, remember?
translation.zh: 我可是“吸血鬼女孩” 记得吗？

translation.en: Hey, look who's back! What up, Bella?
translation.zh:
-看看谁回来了
-贝拉 你还好吗？

translation.en: Quil? You, too? -Yep. Finally made the pack. -[boys chuckle]
translation.zh:
-奎尔 你呢？
-很好 终于加入狼群了

translation.en: I'm glad you're here, Bella.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你来了 贝拉

translation.en: Maybe we can get a break from Jake's obsessive inner monologue.
translation.zh: 我们总算不用听 雅各执迷的内心独白了

translation.en: "I wish Bella would call."
translation.zh: “我好希望贝拉打电话来”

translation.en: "I wish Bella wouldn't call."
translation.zh: “我希望贝拉不打电话来”

translation.en: "Maybe I should call Bella."
translation.zh: “也许我该主动给贝拉打电话”

translation.en: "Maybe I should call Bella and hang up."
translation.zh: “也许我该打给贝拉 然后挂断”

translation.en: All right, you can shut up now.
translation.zh: 好了 都闭嘴吧

translation.en: Bella, this is Leah Clearwater, Harry's daughter.
translation.zh:
贝拉 这是丽娅·克里尔沃特
哈利的女儿

translation.en: Hey. I'm really sorry about your father.
translation.zh: 你好 对于你父亲的死 我很遗憾

translation.en: If you're here to torture Jacob some more, feel free to leave.
translation.zh: 如果你是来这里继续折磨雅各布的 请离开吧

translation.en: Fun, isn't she?
translation.zh: 她挺有意思的 是吧？

translation.en: -Bella, hi! -Hey.
translation.zh:
-贝拉 嗨
-嗨

translation.en: I was wondering when we'd see your face around here again.
translation.zh:
我之前还想着什么时候
能在这儿再见到你呢

translation.en: [Bella] Yeah. Same here.
translation.zh: 是啊 我也是

translation.en: Sam, we good?
translation.zh: 山姆 一切都好吗？

translation.en: We're good.
translation.zh: 一切都好

translation.en: She won't be getting through our line any time soon.
translation.zh: 她现在不会轻易越界了

translation.en: So when did Leah join the pack?
translation.zh: 丽娅什么时候加入狼群的？

translation.en: Around when her dad died. Her brother, Seth, also phased.
translation.zh: 在她父亲死后不久 她的弟弟赛斯也变身了

translation.en: He's only 15, one of the youngest we've had.
translation.zh:
他才15岁
是狼群中最小的成员之一

translation.en: Sam keeps him home studying, but he's chomping at the bit.
translation.zh: 山姆让他在家学习 但他对此很不满

translation.en: I wish it was Leah who'd stay home.
translation.zh: 我倒希望留在家的是丽娅

translation.en: Come on, don't be such a guy.
translation.zh: 别这样一副大男子主义的样子

translation.en: No, it's not a chick thing.
translation.zh: 不 我这么说不是因她是女人

translation.en: It's, you know, a triangle thing.
translation.zh: 而是因为 三角关系

translation.en: We all have to live the Leah/Sam/Emily pain-fest.
translation.zh:
丽娅 山姆和艾米莉三人的痛苦
我们都得承受

translation.en: Wolf telepathy, remember?
translation.zh: 狼人的心理感应 记得吗？

translation.en: So Sam dumps Leah for Emily?
translation.zh: 山姆抛弃了丽娅 选择了艾米莉吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it wasn't like that. Sam hates himself for hurting Leah.
translation.zh: 倒也不能那么说 山姆因为伤害了丽娅 而愧疚不已

translation.en: But Emily was the one.
translation.zh: 但艾米莉是他的真命天女

translation.en: I guess it sort of chooses you sometimes.
translation.zh:
是啊 我想有时候就是陷入其中
没有办法

translation.en: It's more than some crush, Bella.
translation.zh: 不仅仅是喜欢而已 贝拉

translation.en: Sam imprinted on Emily.
translation.zh: 山姆将艾米莉纳为了烙印爱人

translation.en: Do I even want to know what that is?
translation.zh: 我想问那是什么意思

translation.en: Imprinting on someone is like...
translation.zh: 烙印一个人的意思就是

translation.en: Like when you see her, everything changes.
translation.zh: 当你看到她 一切都变得不同

translation.en: All of a sudden, it's not gravity holding you to the planet.
translation.zh: 突然之间 把你束缚在地球上的不是重力作用

translation.en: It's her.
translation.zh: 而是她

translation.en: Nothing else matters.
translation.zh: 其他的一切都不再重要

translation.en: You would do anything,
translation.zh: 你愿意为她做任何事

translation.en: be anything for her.
translation.zh: 变成任何样子

translation.en: Sounds like you know the feeling.
translation.zh: 听起来好像你知道那种感觉

translation.en: Have you imprinted on someone?
translation.zh: 你有没有烙印爱人？

translation.en: You'd know if I had.
translation.zh: 如果我有 你会知道的

translation.en: I just have a direct line to Sam's thoughts.
translation.zh: 我只是能清楚地感应到山姆的感受

translation.en: So for now you're... still you.
translation.zh: 所以现在 你还是原来的你

translation.en: And you're still you. Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你也是原来的你
-是啊

translation.en: Until graduation.
translation.zh: 在毕业前都是

translation.en: Graduation?
translation.zh: 毕业？

translation.en: You knew this was gonna happen.
translation.zh: 你知道这终究要发生的

translation.en: Not in a month!
translation.zh: 但不是一个月后就要成为现实

translation.en: I mean, not before you've... You've even lived.
translation.zh:
我是说 不能你还没好好活一场
就要死去

translation.en: Or before I could...
translation.zh: 不能在我可以…

translation.en: For a second, just a second, I thought...
translation.zh: 有那么一秒 就一秒 我以为…

translation.en: But he's got his hooks in you so deep...
translation.zh: 但是他对你的影响实在太大了

translation.en: I decided this, not him.
translation.zh: 是我自己决定的 与他无关

translation.en: Bella, they're not even alive.
translation.zh: 贝拉 他们甚至都不是活人

translation.en: It makes me sick.
translation.zh: 真让我恶心

translation.en: Better you really be dead than one of them.
translation.zh: 我宁愿你死了 也比变成那种东西好

translation.en: I can't believe you said that.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信你会说出这种话

translation.en: Edward was right, I shouldn't have come.
translation.zh: 爱德华说得对 我不该来的

translation.en: Bella, come on. Please.
translation.zh: 贝拉 拜托 别走

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You know, Edward could at least respect meal times.
translation.zh: 话说 爱德华起码也该尊重下晚饭时间

translation.en: I was just with Jake.
translation.zh: 我是去找雅各了

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I'll just give you two some privacy, then.
translation.zh: 我就不打扰你们了

translation.en: Do you understand how worried I've been?
translation.zh: 你知道我有多担心吗？

translation.en: I was perfectly safe.
translation.zh: 我很安全

translation.en: I almost broke the treaty to make sure--
translation.zh:
我差点就为了你的安全
打破跟狼人的协议

translation.en: I know I smell like a dog.
translation.zh: 我知道 我身上有狼人味儿 对不起

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No, something's wrong.
translation.zh: 不 不是 有点不对劲

translation.en: Edward, what's wrong?
translation.zh: 爱德华 怎么了？

translation.en: Someone's been in here.
translation.zh: 有人来过

translation.en: [Dr. Cullen] Who was it? Someone we know?
translation.zh: 是谁？我们认识吗？

translation.en: This stranger, I didn't recognize his scent.
translation.zh: 陌生人 我不认识他的气味

translation.en: A nomad passing through?
translation.zh: 路过的吸血鬼吗？

translation.en: A passerby wouldn't have left Bella's father alive.
translation.zh: 过路客是不会让贝拉的父亲活着的

translation.en: The scent disappeared about five miles south of Bella's house.
translation.zh:
他的气味在贝拉家
以南8公里处消失了

translation.en: Someone's orchestrating this. Victoria?
translation.zh:
-是有人精心安排的？
-维多利亚吗？

translation.en: I would have seen her decide.
translation.zh: 如果是她 我会预见到的

translation.en: Has to be the Volturi.
translation.zh: 肯定是沃尔图里家族

translation.en: I don't think it's the Volturi, either.
translation.zh: 我想也不是沃尔图里家族

translation.en: I've been watching Aro's decisions, too.
translation.zh: 我也一直监视着阿罗的举动

translation.en: [Emmett] So we keep looking.
translation.zh: 那我们接着搜寻

translation.en: We'll also take shifts guarding Bella at her house.
translation.zh: 我们还要轮流守护贝拉和她家

translation.en: Another protection detail? [Dr. Cullen] Rosalie.
translation.zh:
-又要当保镖吗？
-罗莎莉

translation.en: No, she's right.
translation.zh: 不 她说得很对

translation.en: You can't protect me, watch my dad and search for the intruder.
translation.zh: 你们不能一边保护我 看护我爸爸 又一边搜捕入侵者

translation.en: And for Victoria.
translation.zh: 而且还要找维多利亚

translation.en: And keep yourselves fed.
translation.zh: 以及喂饱你们自己

translation.en: I'm not leaving you here defenseless.
translation.zh: 我不能让你没有任何保护

translation.en: Well, I'm not gonna let you starve.
translation.zh: 我也不能让你们饿死

translation.en: And I wouldn't be unprotected. I have...
translation.zh:
而且我并非是没有任何保护
我有…

translation.en: [Edward] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Whoever it was, he left his stink behind.
translation.zh: 不管是谁 他都留下了气味

translation.en: It'll be hard to miss when we cross it again.
translation.zh: 下次再遇到 一定可以闻出来的

translation.en: We'll handle it from here.
translation.zh: 接下来就由我们负责好了

translation.en: We don't need you to handle anything.
translation.zh: 我们不需要你负责任何事

translation.en: Or anyone.
translation.zh: 也不需要你负责任何人

translation.en: I could care less what you need.
translation.zh: 我才不管你需不需要

translation.en: All right, we're done here.
translation.zh: 好了 你可以走了

translation.en: -No, you're done here. -[Bella] Stop!
translation.zh:
-不 是你可以走了
-别吵了！

translation.en: I'm tired of this. From now on, I'm Switzerland, okay?
translation.zh: 我真是厌倦了这样 从现在开始我是中立国 行了吗？

translation.en: [Bella] Edward hated the idea,
translation.zh: 爱德华不喜欢这样安排

translation.en: but it wasn't about rivalry anymore.
translation.zh: 但现在的重点不是相互竞争

translation.en: It was about my safety, and Charlie's.
translation.zh: 而是事关我和查理的安全

translation.en: In the days that followed, I got them to at least try to work together.
translation.zh: 接下来几天我好歹让他们能够合作了

translation.en: The wolves took over so the Cullens could hunt.
translation.zh: 狼人们接班后 卡伦一家就可以去进食

translation.en: It wasn't exactly an easy alliance.
translation.zh: 维持这样的同盟关系可真不容易

translation.en: Doesn't he own a shirt?
translation.zh: 他连件上衣都没有吗？

translation.en: I'm good here. You should go.
translation.zh: 我在这里很安全 你走吧

translation.en: I'm not gonna be gone long.
translation.zh: 我不会离开很长时间的

translation.en: Don't rush. You need to hunt.
translation.zh: 别赶得太匆忙 你需要好好进食

translation.en: Maybe rush a little bit.
translation.zh: 或许你还是稍微赶一点吧

translation.en: -Hey, beautiful. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-嗨 美女
-嗨

translation.en: So, what do you wanna do today?
translation.zh: 那么 今天想做什么？

translation.en: Bike, hike, just hang? Your call.
translation.zh: 骑车、散步、闲逛 听你的

translation.en: But we're going to a party tonight.
translation.zh: 或者我们今晚可以去参加个派对

translation.en: Are you sure this is okay?
translation.zh: 你确定这样行吗？

translation.en: I really hate being a party crasher.
translation.zh:
我真的不想破坏大家在派对上
玩乐的兴致

translation.en: Technically, you're a council meeting crasher.
translation.zh: 严格来说 你来参加的是个理事会

translation.en: You see? The council leaders,
translation.zh: 你看 理事会领导人 爸爸

translation.en: Dad, Quil's grandpa and Sue Clearwater.
translation.zh: 奎尔的爷爷 以及苏·克里尔沃特

translation.en: She took over for Harry when he died.
translation.zh: 哈利死后 由她来接班

translation.en: Okay, I should not be here.
translation.zh: 好吧 我不该来这里

translation.en: You're okay. I thought...
translation.zh: 你可以来的 我觉得…

translation.en: I mean, they thought it would be good for you to hear the histories.
translation.zh: 他们认为你应该听听这些历史

translation.en: The histories?
translation.zh: 历史？

translation.en: The tribe's histories? Aren't they secret?
translation.zh: 部落的历史 难道不是秘密吗？

translation.en: We all got a role to play, and you're part of this.
translation.zh: 我们都是其中的一份子 你也是

translation.en: I mean, it's the first time Seth, Leah and Quil'll hear them, too.
translation.zh: 赛斯 丽娅和奎尔也是第一次来听

translation.en: But you are the first outsider. Ever.
translation.zh: 不过 你确实是有史以来第一个外人

translation.en: If I had known that, I would have, like...
translation.zh: 如果我早知道这样

translation.en: I don't know, dressed better. [Seth] Jake!
translation.zh:
-我会穿得好一点
-雅各！

translation.en: Hey. It's about time you got here.
translation.zh:
-嘿
-你来的正是时候

translation.en: Paul's been hoovering the grub, but I saved you some burgers.
translation.zh: 保罗把食物都吃光了 不过我给你留了些汉堡

translation.en: Good looking out, bro.
translation.zh: 谢谢你替我着想 兄弟

translation.en: Bella, this is Seth Clearwater, Leah's brother.
translation.zh:
贝拉 这是赛斯·克里尔沃特
丽娅的弟弟

translation.en: -Hi. -Newest member of the pack.
translation.zh: 狼群的最新成员

translation.en: Newest. Bestest. Brightest.
translation.zh: 最新的、最好的、最聪明的

translation.en: And slowest.
translation.zh: 也是速度最慢的

translation.en: -Come on, your dad's about to start. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-来吧 你爸爸马上就开始了
-好

translation.en: The Quileutes have been a small tribe from the beginning,
translation.zh: 奎鲁特族从一开始就是个很小的部落

translation.en: but we have always had magic in our blood.
translation.zh: 但我们的血液中流淌着魔力

translation.en: We were great spirit warriors,
translation.zh: 我们是杰出的精神勇士

translation.en: shape-shifters that transformed to the powerful wolf.
translation.zh: 是变形人 能够变成强大的狼

translation.en: This enabled us to scare off our enemies
translation.zh: 那让我们能够吓走敌人

translation.en: and protect our tribe.
translation.zh: 保护我们的部落

translation.en: One day, our warriors came across a creature.
translation.zh: 有一天我们的勇士遇到了 一种生物

translation.en: It looked like a man, but it was hard like stone
translation.zh: 它看起来是人类 可是却硬如石

translation.en: and cold as ice.
translation.zh: 冷若冰

translation.en: Our warriors' sharp teeth finally tore it apart,
translation.zh: 我们勇士的尖牙 最终把它撕裂了

translation.en: but only fire would completely destroy it.
translation.zh: 但是只有火才能将它彻底毁灭

translation.en: They lived in fear that the cold man was not alone.
translation.zh: 他们生活在恐惧之中 担心那个吸血鬼还有同伙

translation.en: And they were right.
translation.zh: 他们猜对了

translation.en: She took her vengeance out on the village.
translation.zh: 她对整个村庄的人展开了复仇行为

translation.en: Our elder chief, Taha Aki,
translation.zh: 我们的前辈领袖 塔哈·阿吉

translation.en: was the only spirit warrior left
translation.zh: 是唯一留下来拯救部落的精神勇士

translation.en: to save the tribe after his son was killed.
translation.zh: 是唯一留下来拯救部落的精神勇士 彼时他的儿子已被杀死

translation.en: Taha Aki's third wife could see that he would lose.
translation.zh:
塔哈·阿吉的第三个妻子
看出他快输了

translation.en: The third wife was no magical being,
translation.zh: 第三个妻子是普通人类

translation.en: no special powers but one...
translation.zh: 没有超能力 但是她有

translation.en: courage.
translation.zh: 勇气

translation.en: The third wife's sacrifice distracted the cold woman
translation.zh: 第三个妻子的牺牲 分散了女吸血鬼的注意力

translation.en: long enough for Taha Aki to destroy her.
translation.zh: 足以让塔哈·阿吉毁灭了她

translation.en: She saved the tribe.
translation.zh: 她拯救了部落

translation.en: Over time, our enemies have disappeared.
translation.zh:
随着时间的推移
我们的敌人逐一消失

translation.en: But one remains,
translation.zh: 但有一种留存了下来

translation.en: the cold ones.
translation.zh: 就是吸血鬼

translation.en: Our magic awakens when they're near,
translation.zh: 每当他们靠近 我们的魔力就会苏醒

translation.en: and we sense it now.
translation.zh: 我们现在就感受到了

translation.en: We feel the threat in our blood.
translation.zh: 血液里感到了威胁

translation.en: Something terrible is coming,
translation.zh: 灾难即将来临

translation.en: and we must all be ready, all of us.
translation.zh: 我们必须做好准备 所有的人

translation.en: What did you do to me?
translation.zh: 你对我做了什么？

translation.en: I'm so... Yeah. I know.
translation.zh:
-我好…
-是啊 我知道

translation.en: We'll find you someone to drink.
translation.zh: 我们会找个人 让你喝个饱的

translation.en: Just try not to get killed, will you?
translation.zh: 不要让自己被杀 明白吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna need numbers.
translation.zh: 我还需要人手

translation.en: Seattle is in a state of terror.
translation.zh: 西雅图被恐惧笼罩

translation.en: Police are baffled by the escalating murders and disappearances.
translation.zh:
警方正面临越来越多的
谋杀案与失踪案

translation.en: Theories range from a vicious new gang
translation.zh: 人们猜测是残暴的新帮派

translation.en: to a wildly active serial killer. Reporting live...
translation.zh: 或许是异常活跃的连环杀手作案

translation.en: It's getting worse. We're going to have to do something.
translation.zh: 事态正在恶化 我们必须采取行动

translation.en: It takes more than one of our kind to cause the damage they're reporting.
translation.zh: 一个吸血鬼是搞不出这么大动静的

translation.en: Quite a few more.
translation.zh: 肯定要很多

translation.en: And they're undisciplined, conspicuous.
translation.zh: 他们没受过训练 行事高调

translation.en: It's newborns.
translation.zh: 是新生儿

translation.en: What, like new vampires?
translation.zh: 什么 新生的吸血鬼吗？

translation.en: In the first few months after the change.
translation.zh: 就是他们转化成吸血鬼后的头几个月

translation.en: That's when we're at our most uncontrollable. Vicious.
translation.zh: 那是最难控制的时候 邪恶残暴 因饥渴而疯狂

translation.en: Insane with thirst.
translation.zh: 邪恶残暴 因饥渴而疯狂

translation.en: Something to look forward to.
translation.zh: 只有一个企盼

translation.en: No one's trained these newborns, but this isn't random.
translation.zh: 没有人训练这些新生儿 但这绝对不是偶然的

translation.en: Someone's creating an army.
translation.zh: 有人在制造吸血鬼大军

translation.en: Well, now we're definitely going to Seattle.
translation.zh: 现在我们必须去西雅图了

translation.en: An army of vampires?
translation.zh: 吸血鬼大军

translation.en: And they've been created to fight someone.
translation.zh: 他们被制造出来肯定是要和谁作战的

translation.en: We're the only clan even close to Seattle.
translation.zh: 我们是离西雅图最近的族系

translation.en: [Dr. Cullen] Regardless of why they were made,
translation.zh: 那就意味着 不管他们是谁

translation.en: if we don't put a stop to them, the Volturi will.
translation.zh: 如果我们不阻止他们 沃尔图里家族会来的

translation.en: I'm surprised they've let it go on this long.
translation.zh: 我很惊讶他们居然放任不管这么久

translation.en: Maybe they're behind it.
translation.zh: 也许他们正是幕后黑手

translation.en: In Italy, I read Aro's mind.
translation.zh: 在意大利 我读到了阿罗的想法

translation.en: He wants me and Alice to join him,
translation.zh: 他想要我和爱丽丝入伙

translation.en: but he knows we'll never choose him
translation.zh: 但他知道只要我们的家族还在

translation.en: as long as our family's still alive.
translation.zh: 我们就不会同意的

translation.en: An army could solve that for him.
translation.zh: 一支军队可以替他解决这个问题

translation.en: Did you eat dinner yet?
translation.zh: 你吃过晚饭了吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, I haven't.
translation.zh: 没 我还没吃

translation.en: This kid, Riley Biers, disappeared over a year ago,
translation.zh: 这个叫莱利·比尔斯的孩子 一年前失踪了

translation.en: and his poor parents have been papering Seattle
translation.zh: 他可怜的父母从那时起

translation.en: with these things ever since.
translation.zh: 在西雅图到处张贴寻人启事

translation.en: You think they should just give up?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们该放弃吗？

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't if it were you.
translation.zh: 是我就不会 如果失踪的是你

translation.en: Not ever.
translation.zh: 我永远不会放弃寻找你的

translation.en: [Bella] I have to figure out what to tell people.
translation.zh: 我得想好对大家的说辞

translation.en: Why I won't be home for Christmases,
translation.zh: 为什么我圣诞不回家了

translation.en: and why I won't visit,
translation.zh: 为什么我不再拜访他们

translation.en: why they'll never see me again.
translation.zh: 为什么他们再也见不到我

translation.en: After a few decades, everyone you know will be dead.
translation.zh: 几十年后 你认识的人都会死去

translation.en: Problem solved.
translation.zh: 问题就解决了

translation.en: Why are you so against me becoming like you?
translation.zh: 为什么你如此反对我变成吸血鬼呢？

translation.en: I've told you.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你

translation.en: Be honest with me. There's more.
translation.zh: 不要骗我 肯定还有别的理由

translation.en: I know the consequences of this choice you're making.
translation.zh:
因为我深知你所做的
选择会带来的后果

translation.en: I've lived through it.
translation.zh: 我曾切身经历过

translation.en: And to let you suffer that...
translation.zh: 所以不想让你再遭受那个罪

translation.en: You believe I have a soul, and I don't.
translation.zh: 你总相信我是有灵魂的 其实我没有

translation.en: But to risk yours,
translation.zh: 但是拿你的灵魂去冒险

translation.en: just for the sake of never having to lose you,
translation.zh: 就为了永远不失去你

translation.en: that's the most selfish thing I'll ever do.
translation.zh: 那将是我所做的最自私的事

translation.en: I thought that you were afraid that I'd be too different.
translation.zh:
我以为 你可能是怕
我会变得太不一样

translation.en: You know, like, I wouldn't be warm,
translation.zh: 不一样 我不会再 如此…温暖

translation.en: and I wouldn't smell the same.
translation.zh: 而且气味也会不一样了

translation.en: You'll always be my Bella.
translation.zh: 你永远都是我的贝拉

translation.en: My Bella, just less fragile.
translation.zh: 我的贝拉 只是没那么脆弱了

translation.en: [Bella] Gosh, it's so pretty here.
translation.zh: 天啊 这儿好漂亮

translation.en: So, Alice has planned a big graduation party.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝在策划一个盛大的毕业派对

translation.en: Which you're invited to.
translation.zh: 你也被邀请了

translation.en: Yeah, I figured that.
translation.zh: 好吧 我就知道

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I just wanted to do this differently.
translation.zh: 我一直想以不同的方式来做这事

translation.en: Smoother.
translation.zh: 更自然一些

translation.en: But now I'm out of time.
translation.zh: 但现在 没有那么多时间了

translation.en: Do what?
translation.zh: 做什么？

translation.en: You need to hear the truth, Bella,
translation.zh: 你必须知道真相 贝拉

translation.en: understand all your options.
translation.zh: 搞清楚你所有的选择

translation.en: And you need to know
translation.zh: 你要知道

translation.en: that I'm in love with you,
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: and I want you to choose me instead of him.
translation.zh: 我希望你能选择我 而不是他

translation.en: I thought you understood.
translation.zh: 我以为你明白我的心意

translation.en: I don't feel that way for you. I don't buy it.
translation.zh:
-我对你没有那种感觉
-我不相信

translation.en: What don't you buy?
translation.zh: 你不相信什么？

translation.en: That's how I feel.
translation.zh: 我就是这种感觉

translation.en: You feel something else for me. You just won't admit it.
translation.zh: 你对我还有别的感觉 你只是不愿承认罢了

translation.en: So I'm not giving up. I'm gonna fight for you...
translation.zh: 所以我不会放弃的 我要争取你

translation.en: until your heart stops beating.
translation.zh: 直到你的心脏停止跳动

translation.en: Well, then you're not gonna have to fight for long.
translation.zh: 那你用不着争取多久了

translation.en: You're rushing into it because you're afraid you'll change your mind.
translation.zh: 你急着想变成吸血鬼 是因为你害怕自己会改变主意

translation.en: No, I'm not.
translation.zh: 不 我不是

translation.en: I know what I want.
translation.zh: 我知道我想要什么

translation.en: You wouldn't have to change for me, Bella,
translation.zh: 你跟着我 都不需要转化 贝拉

translation.en: or say goodbye to anybody.
translation.zh: 也不用跟任何人永别

translation.en: I can give you more than him.
translation.zh: 我比他能给你更多的东西

translation.en: I mean, he probably can't even kiss you without hurting you.
translation.zh: 他要吻你 都还要小心怕伤着你

translation.en: Feel that?
translation.zh: 感觉到了吗？

translation.en: Flesh and blood. And warmth.
translation.zh: 活生生的血、肉、以及温暖

translation.en: Edward!
translation.zh: 爱德华

translation.en: If you ever touch her against her will again...
translation.zh: 如果你再敢强迫碰她

translation.en: Don't do this here!
translation.zh: 不要这样！

translation.en: She's not sure what she wants.
translation.zh: 她根本就不确定自己想要什么

translation.en: -Don't do this here! -Let me give you a clue.
translation.zh:
-不要这样！
-好 那我给你个提示

translation.en: Wait for her to say the words.
translation.zh: 等她把话说完

translation.en: Fine! And she will.
translation.zh: 好啊 她会说的

translation.en: Jacob, just go, okay?
translation.zh: 雅各布 你走吧

translation.en: [Charlie] Hey, hey, hey! Easy, guys. Easy. Let's take it down a notch. All right?
translation.zh: 行了二位 都冷静一点 好吗？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: I kissed Bella.
translation.zh: 我吻了贝拉

translation.en: And she broke her hand.
translation.zh: 她弄伤了手

translation.en: Punching my face.
translation.zh: 是打我脸打的

translation.en: Total misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 这都只是误会

translation.en: [Dr. Cullen] It's just a sprain. It should heal fairly quickly.
translation.zh: 扭伤而已 很快就会好的

translation.en: Trying to walk and chew gum at the same time again, Bella?
translation.zh: 又一边走路一边嚼口香糖了吗？

translation.en: I punched a werewolf in the face.
translation.zh:
-我揍了狼人的脸
-真厉害

translation.en: Badass. You're gonna be one tough little newborn.
translation.zh:
-我揍了狼人的脸
-真厉害 你会是个难缠的新生儿

translation.en: Tough enough to take you on.
translation.zh: 可以好好跟你斗一下

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: Got any leads?
translation.zh: 有线索吗？

translation.en: No sign of the intruder. But Victoria continues to make appearances.
translation.zh:
没有入侵者的迹象
但维多利亚不断出现

translation.en: Go blather to someone else about the joys of becoming a newborn.
translation.zh: 找别人唠叨成为新生儿的喜悦去

translation.en: Okay... Rosalie,
translation.zh: 好吧 罗莎莉

translation.en: I don't understand what I did to make you hate me so much.
translation.zh: 我不明白我做了什么让你这么讨厌我

translation.en: I don't hate you.
translation.zh: 我不讨厌你

translation.en: I don't particularly like you, but...
translation.zh: 我虽不是很喜欢你 但是…

translation.en: Bella, I envy you. What?
translation.zh:
-贝拉 我嫉妒你
-什么？

translation.en: That's ridiculous. No, it's not.
translation.zh:
-太荒谬了
-一点也不

translation.en: You have a choice. I didn't.
translation.zh: 你有选择 我当初却没有

translation.en: None of us did. But you do, and you're choosing wrong.
translation.zh: 我们都没有 但你有 而你却要做出错误的选择

translation.en: I don't care how miserable your human life is.
translation.zh: 我不在乎你作为人类的生活有多悲惨

translation.en: My life is not miserable.
translation.zh: 我的生活不凄惨

translation.en: I mean, it's not perfect. Nobody's life is perfect.
translation.zh:
我的生活不完美
但没人的生活是完美的

translation.en: Mine was. Absolutely perfect.
translation.zh: 我曾经的生活 是绝对完美的

translation.en: There were things I still wanted,
translation.zh: 有我曾经梦想得到的一切

translation.en: to be married, with a nice house
translation.zh: 结婚 有一所大房子

translation.en: and a husband to kiss me when he came home,
translation.zh: 丈夫会在我回家时吻我

translation.en: a family of my own.
translation.zh: 我自己的家庭

translation.en: Royce King was the most eligible bachelor in town.
translation.zh:
罗伊斯·金是当时镇上
最优质的单身汉

translation.en: I barely knew him.
translation.zh: 我对他知之甚少

translation.en: But I was young. I was in love with the idea of love.
translation.zh:
但我太年轻了
我爱上的只是爱情本身

translation.en: On the last night of my life, I left a friend's house late.
translation.zh:
在我生命中的最后一天
我深夜离开朋友家

translation.en: I wasn't far from home. There she is.
translation.zh:
-我离家并不远
-她来了

translation.en: Hey, Rose!
translation.zh: 罗莎 过来

translation.en: Come over here! Here. Hold this.
translation.zh: 罗莎 过来 给 拿着这个

translation.en: Hey, come over here. We've been waiting for you.
translation.zh: 过来 我们一直在等你

translation.en: There she is.
translation.zh: 她来了

translation.en: Royce. Royce!
translation.zh: 罗伊斯

translation.en: You're drunk.
translation.zh: 你喝醉了

translation.en: Isn't she lovely, John? I told you she was a looker.
translation.zh: 她是不是很可爱 约翰？ 我就跟你说她是个美人儿

translation.en: It's hard to say with all those clothes on.
translation.zh: 她穿着那么多衣服 很难说啊

translation.en: What do you say, Rose? -Why don't we take off a few layers? -Stop it, stop it.
translation.zh: 你说呢 罗莎？不如我们脱掉几层？

translation.en: Stop. Stop!
translation.zh: 住手！

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天等你清醒了 我们再见

translation.en: Hey, where do you think you're going?
translation.zh: 等等 你这是要去哪儿？

translation.en: -I said, get-- -Stop! Stop! -Come back. -Get off me!
translation.zh:
-回来 嘿
-放开我 住手

translation.en: -Hey. You'll do as I say! -Let go of me! Stop!
translation.zh:
-照我说的做
-放开我！住手！

translation.en: They left me in the street, thinking I was dead.
translation.zh:
他们把我丢在大街上
以为我已经死了

translation.en: Believe me, I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 相信我 我倒希望自己死了

translation.en: Carlisle found me. He smelled all the blood.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔发现了我 他闻到了血的味道

translation.en: Thought he was helping me. I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-他以为他是在救我
-我很遗憾

translation.en: I got my revenge on them.
translation.zh: 我好歹还是报了仇

translation.en: One at a time.
translation.zh: 一次一个

translation.en: Saved Royce for last, so he'd know I was coming.
translation.zh:
我把罗伊斯留在最后
让他知道我会去索命

translation.en: I was a little theatrical back then.
translation.zh: 我当年有些戏剧化

translation.en: Things got better after I found Emmett.
translation.zh: 我遇到埃美特后 情况就好多了

translation.en: But we'll always be this.
translation.zh: 但我们永远都只能是这样

translation.en: Frozen. Never moving forward.
translation.zh: 冰冷的 永远无法向前

translation.en: That's what I miss the most. Possibilities.
translation.zh:
我最怀念的
就是拥有无尽可能的未来

translation.en: Sitting on a front porch somewhere,
translation.zh: 坐在前面的门廊上

translation.en: Emmett, gray-haired, by my side,
translation.zh: 和埃美特头发花白地坐在一起

translation.en: surrounded by our grandchildren.
translation.zh: 被我们的孙子孙女在膝下围着

translation.en: Their laughter.
translation.zh: 听着他们的笑声

translation.en: I understand that that's what you want.
translation.zh: 我明白 那是你想要的

translation.en: But there's nothing I'm ever gonna want more...
translation.zh: 但我想要的永远只有

translation.en: than Edward.
translation.zh: 爱德华

translation.en: You're wrong again.
translation.zh: 你又错了

translation.en: After you've been changed, there's one thing you'll want more,
translation.zh:
在你变成吸血鬼后
有样东西你会更想要

translation.en: one thing you'll kill for.
translation.zh: 你会为之杀戮

translation.en: Blood.
translation.zh: 血

translation.en: What did I say about a low profile?
translation.zh: 我不是说过要低调行事吗？

translation.en: Something's coming.
translation.zh: 有东西要来了

translation.en: Something bigger than any of us alone.
translation.zh: 他们比我们任何一个人都强大

translation.en: And if you can't control yourselves,
translation.zh: 如果你们不能 控制自己

translation.en: we're all going to die.
translation.zh: 我们就只有死路一条

translation.en: What's done is done, just...
translation.zh: 木已成舟

translation.en: clean up after yourselves.
translation.zh: 但你们在吸血后 请清理干净

translation.en: They've already drawn too much attention.
translation.zh: 他们已经吸引了太多的注意

translation.en: So has our inaction.
translation.zh: 我们却一直未采取任何行动

translation.en: Others may begin to question the Volturi's effectiveness.
translation.zh:
其他人也许已经开始
质疑沃尔图里家族的效率

translation.en: Let them.
translation.zh: 随他们去吧

translation.en: Maybe we should consult with Aro.
translation.zh: 或许我们应该问下阿罗

translation.en: Aro's decisions are being watched.
translation.zh: 阿罗的抉择已经被监视

translation.en: We must decide.
translation.zh: 我们做决定就行

translation.en: Then decide, sister. It's time.
translation.zh: 那就快决定吧 姐姐 是时候了

translation.en: Yes, it is.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错

translation.en: Either we let them do what they were created for,
translation.zh: 我们要么任他们完成使命

translation.en: or we end them.
translation.zh: 要么消灭他们

translation.en: Decisions, decisions.
translation.zh: 决定啊 好难决定

translation.en: When we were five, they asked us
translation.zh: 我们五岁时 大人们问我们长大后想成为什么

translation.en: what we wanted to be when we grew up.
translation.zh: 大人们问我们长大后想成为什么

translation.en: Our answers were things like astronaut, president,
translation.zh: 我们的回答是宇航员 总统之类的

translation.en: or, in my case, a princess.
translation.zh: 就我而言 我想成为公主

translation.en: When we were ten, they asked again.
translation.zh: 当我们十岁时 他们又问一次

translation.en: We answered rock star, cowboy
translation.zh: 我们的回答是 摇滚明星 牛仔

translation.en: or, in my case, a gold medalist.
translation.zh: 就我而言 则是成为冠军

translation.en: But now that we've grown up, they want a serious answer.
translation.zh:
但现在我们长大了
他们想要真正的答案

translation.en: Well, how about this?
translation.zh: 大家听听这个回答怎么样

translation.en: "Who the hell knows?"
translation.zh: 谁他妈知道？

translation.en: This isn't the time to make hard-and-fast decisions.
translation.zh: 现在不是做艰难而迅速的决定之时

translation.en: This is the time to make mistakes.
translation.zh: 现在是犯错误的时候

translation.en: Take the wrong train and get stuck somewhere.
translation.zh: 登上错误的列车 被困在某处

translation.en: Fall in love a lot.
translation.zh: 坠入爱河 很多次

translation.en: Major in philosophy, because there's no way to make a career out of that.
translation.zh: 主修哲学 那是不可能成为事业的

translation.en: Change your mind, and change it again, because nothing's permanent.
translation.zh:
改变主意 再反悔
因为没有什么是永恒的

translation.en: So make as many mistakes as you can.
translation.zh: 所以 尽可能地去犯错

translation.en: That way, someday, when they ask what we want to be,
translation.zh:
那样 有一天
当人们问我们想成为什么时

translation.en: we won't have to guess.
translation.zh: 我们就不需要再瞎猜了

translation.en: We'll know.
translation.zh: 我们早已深知

translation.en: You made it!
translation.zh: 你总算来了

translation.en: Hey. What did you think of my speech?
translation.zh: 你觉得我的演讲怎么样？

translation.en: Too easy-breezy? Too self-helpful? You hated it?
translation.zh: 太平淡 太自我吗？有话就直说吧

translation.en: No. I think you pretty much nailed it.
translation.zh: 不 你做得很好

translation.en: It's like I was born to lead, right?
translation.zh: 我天生就是个领导者 对吧？

translation.en: I love this song! Let's go.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这首歌 去跳舞吧

translation.en: What are you doing here? You invited me, remember?
translation.zh:
-你来这里做什么？
-你邀请我来的 记得吗？

translation.en: Was my right hook too subtle for you?
translation.zh:
我的右勾拳对你来说
太软弱无力了吗？

translation.en: That was me uninviting you.
translation.zh: 那意思就是我收回对你的邀请

translation.en: Look, Bella, I'm sorry about, you know,
translation.zh: 贝拉 我很抱歉 就是…

translation.en: the kiss and your hand.
translation.zh: 那个吻 以及让你的手受伤

translation.en: I'd blame it on the whole inner animal thing,
translation.zh: 我倒想说是我体内的兽性在作祟

translation.en: but it was really just me being an ass.
translation.zh: 但其实只是我…当时太混蛋了

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: I brought you something.
translation.zh: 我带了个东西给你

translation.en: A graduation present. I made it myself.
translation.zh: 毕业礼物 我自己做的

translation.en: You made this?
translation.zh: 你亲手做的？

translation.en: It's really pretty. Thanks.
translation.zh: 很漂亮 谢谢

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 等我一下

translation.en: Alice, what'd you see? The decision's been made.
translation.zh:
-爱丽丝 你看到什么了？
-决定已经作出

translation.en: What's going on? You're not going to Seattle.
translation.zh:
-怎么回事？
-你们不用去西雅图了吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不必了

translation.en: They're coming here.
translation.zh: 他们要来这里了

translation.en: They'll be here in four days.
translation.zh: 四天后就到

translation.en: This could turn into a bloodbath.
translation.zh: 估计会成为一场血战

translation.en: Who's behind it? I didn't see anyone I recognized.
translation.zh:
-幕后主使者是谁？
-我没看到认识的

translation.en: Maybe one.
translation.zh: 也许有一个

translation.en: I know his face. He's local. Riley Biers.
translation.zh: 我认识 他是本地人 莱利·比尔斯

translation.en: He didn't start this.
translation.zh: 但他不是幕后主使 那个幕后主使在暗地里操纵着

translation.en: Whoever did is staying out of the action.
translation.zh: 那个幕后主使在暗地里操纵着

translation.en: They must be playing with the blind spots in your vision.
translation.zh: 他们利用了你预知能力的盲点

translation.en: [Jasper] Either way, the army is coming
translation.zh: 无论如何 大军已经来了

translation.en: and there aren't enough of us to protect the town.
translation.zh: 我们的人数不足以保护这个小镇

translation.en: Hold up. What damn army?
translation.zh: 等等 什么大军？

translation.en: Newborns. Our kind. What are they after?
translation.zh:
-新生儿 吸血鬼
-他们的目标是什么？

translation.en: They were passing around Bella's scent.
translation.zh: 他们在传递贝拉的衣服 闻气味

translation.en: A red blouse.
translation.zh: 一件红衬衣

translation.en: They're after Bella? What the hell does this mean?
translation.zh:
他们的目标是贝拉吗？ -那是什么意思？
-意味着一场恶战

translation.en: It means an ugly fight. With lives lost.
translation.zh:
-那是什么意思？
-意味着一场恶战 和很多人丧生

translation.en: All right. We're in.
translation.zh:
好吧 -我们加入
-不行

translation.en: No. You'd get yourselves killed. No way.
translation.zh: 你们会被杀的 不可能

translation.en: I wasn't asking for permission. Edward?
translation.zh:
-我不是在请求许可
-爱德华

translation.en: It means more protection for you.
translation.zh: 那意味着你可以得到更多的保护

translation.en: Jacob, do you believe Sam would agree to an understanding?
translation.zh:
雅各布 你觉得山姆
愿意达成共识吗？

translation.en: As long as we get to kill some vampires.
translation.zh: 只要我们能杀一些吸血鬼就行

translation.en: [Dr. Cullen] Jasper? They'll give us the numbers.
translation.zh:
-贾斯帕？
-他们可以增加我们的胜算

translation.en: Newborns won't know they even exist.
translation.zh: 那些新生儿都不知道狼人的存在

translation.en: That'll give us an edge.
translation.zh: 那会让我们多一些优势

translation.en: We'll need to coordinate.
translation.zh: 我们需要通力合作

translation.en: Carlisle, they're gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔 他们会受伤的

translation.en: We'll all need some training.
translation.zh: 我们都需要训练

translation.en: Fighting newborns requires knowledge that Jasper has.
translation.zh: 与新生儿作战需要学习贾斯帕的经验

translation.en: You're welcome to join us.
translation.zh: 欢迎加入

translation.en: All right. Name the time and place.
translation.zh: 很好 定个时间和地点吧

translation.en: Jake, you don't know what you're getting yourself into.
translation.zh:
雅各 你不知道你这是将自己卷入了
什么境况中

translation.en: Bella,
translation.zh: 贝拉

translation.en: this is what we do. You should be happy.
translation.zh: 我们就该这么做 你应该高兴才是

translation.en: Look at us, working together.
translation.zh: 看看我们 一起作战

translation.en: You are the one who wanted us to get along. Remember?
translation.zh: 是你希望我们和睦相处的 记得吗？

translation.en: Again!
translation.zh: 再来！

translation.en: It's a graduation present.
translation.zh: 只是毕业礼物而已

translation.en: They don't trust us enough to be in their human forms.
translation.zh: 他们不够信任我们 才不以人形现身

translation.en: They came. That's what matters.
translation.zh: 他们来了 那才是最重要的

translation.en: Will you translate?
translation.zh: 你能帮忙翻译一下吗？

translation.en: Hey, Jake.
translation.zh: 嗨 雅各

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: Jasper has experience with newborns.
translation.zh: 贾斯帕有和新生儿打交道的经验

translation.en: He'll teach us how to defeat them.
translation.zh: 他会教我们如何打败他们

translation.en: They want to know how the newborns differ from us.
translation.zh: 他们想知道新生儿和我们有什么不同

translation.en: They're a great deal stronger than us
translation.zh: 他们比我们要强壮很多

translation.en: because their own human blood lingers in their tissues.
translation.zh:
因为他们的身体组织里
还残留着作为人类的血液

translation.en: Our kind is never more physically powerful
translation.zh: 吸血鬼的能力在转变后的

translation.en: than in our first several months of this life.
translation.zh: 开始几个月 体能是最强大的

translation.en: Carlisle's right. That's why they are created.
translation.zh: 卡莱尔说得对 所以有人才创造出他们

translation.en: A newborn army doesn't need thousands like a human army,
translation.zh: 一支新生儿大军 不像人类大军那样需要成千上万人

translation.en: but no human army could stand against them.
translation.zh: 没有哪支人类军队可以与他们对抗

translation.en: Now, the two most important things to remember are, first,
translation.zh: 有两件最重要的事需要记住 第一

translation.en: never let them get their arms around you. They'll crush you instantly.
translation.zh: 永远不要被他们的胳膊环抱住 他们可以瞬间将你们的身体挤碎

translation.en: And second,
translation.zh: 第二

translation.en: never go for the obvious kill.
translation.zh: 不要想着轻松击中要害

translation.en: They'll be expecting that, and you will lose.
translation.zh: 他们就等着你那么做 你只会输

translation.en: Emmett.
translation.zh: 埃美特

translation.en: Don't hold back. Not in my nature.
translation.zh:
-不要有所保留
-我不是那种人

translation.en: Never lose focus.
translation.zh: 绝不要放松警惕

translation.en: One more thing.
translation.zh: 还有一件事

translation.en: Never turn your back on your enemy.
translation.zh: 永远不要背对着敌人

translation.en: Some of you are gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: 你们中的有些人会受伤的

translation.en: Some of you could get killed because of me.
translation.zh: 甚至会死 都是因为我

translation.en: It's gonna be 100 times worse than this, right?
translation.zh: 实战会比这个惊险一百倍 对吗？

translation.en: Done for the day.
translation.zh: 今天就此结束吧

translation.en: Jasper?
translation.zh: 贾斯帕

translation.en: Are you sure there's nothing I can do to help?
translation.zh: 你确定我什么忙都帮不上吗？

translation.en: Well, your presence alone, your scent, will distract the newborns.
translation.zh: 你单是出现就算是帮很大忙了 你的味道会分散新生儿的注意力

translation.en: Their hunting instinct will take over and drive them crazy.
translation.zh:
他们的猎食本性会占据上风
把他们逼疯

translation.en: Good. I'm glad.
translation.zh: 很好 我很高兴知道

translation.en: Hey. How do you know so much about this?
translation.zh: 你怎么会知道这么多事？

translation.en: I didn't have quite the same upbringing as my adopted siblings.
translation.zh:
我没有像我那些被收养的
兄弟姐妹们那样 从转化之初就受到很好的培养

translation.en: Those bites are like mine.
translation.zh: 你这些咬痕跟我的一样

translation.en: Battle scars.
translation.zh: 战斗伤

translation.en: All the training the Confederate Army gave me
translation.zh: 我在南方同盟军接受的所有训练

translation.en: was useless against the newborns.
translation.zh: 在面对新生儿时 显得那么无力

translation.en: Still, I never lost a fight.
translation.zh: 但是 我依然没输过一次

translation.en: This happened during the Civil War?
translation.zh: 这是南北战争时的事吗？

translation.en: I was the youngest major in the Texas cavalry,
translation.zh: 我当时是德州骑兵最年轻的少校

translation.en: all without having seen any real battle.
translation.zh: 却从未见识过一场真正的战斗

translation.en: Until?
translation.zh: 直到…

translation.en: Till I met a certain immortal.
translation.zh: 直到我遇到了永生的吸血鬼

translation.en: Maria.
translation.zh: 玛利亚

translation.en: I was riding back to Galveston
translation.zh: 我当时正骑马回加尔维斯敦

translation.en: after evacuating a column of women and children
translation.zh:
在此之前
我刚刚救出了一队妇女和儿童

translation.en: when I saw them.
translation.zh: 我一看到她

translation.en: I immediately offered them my aid.
translation.zh: 就打算帮助她

translation.en: Lovely. And an officer.
translation.zh: 真帅气 还是一位军官

translation.en: You'd better do it, Maria. I can never stop once I've started.
translation.zh: 最好还是你来 玛利亚 我一开始吸就停不下来

translation.en: What's your name, soldier?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字 士兵？

translation.en: Major Jasper Whitlock, ma'am.
translation.zh: 贾斯帕·维特洛克少校 女士

translation.en: I hope you survive.
translation.zh: 我愿你能存活下去

translation.en: You may be of great use to me.
translation.zh: 你对我来说或许有很大的用处

translation.en: Maria was creating an army?
translation.zh: 玛利亚当时是在制造一支军队吗？

translation.en: They were very common in the South.
translation.zh: 那在南方是很常见的

translation.en: There were constant brutal battles for territory.
translation.zh: 为争夺领地 通常会发生恶战

translation.en: Maria won them all.
translation.zh: 玛利亚每次都胜利

translation.en: She was smart, careful, and she had me.
translation.zh: 她聪明 谨慎 而且她手下有我

translation.en: I was her second in command.
translation.zh: 我是她的副将

translation.en: My ability to control emotions served her well.
translation.zh: 我控制情绪的能力 令她很满意

translation.en: I trained her newborns.
translation.zh: 我为她训练新生儿

translation.en: An endless occupation
translation.zh: 那简直是一份无期的工作

translation.en: since she never let them live beyond their first year.
translation.zh: 因为她从不让他们活过第一年

translation.en: It was my job to dispose of them.
translation.zh: 我的工作也包括处理掉他们

translation.en: I could feel everything they felt.
translation.zh: 我可以感受到他们的一切感受

translation.en: I thought what Maria and I had was love.
translation.zh: 我以为玛利亚和我之间的感情就是爱

translation.en: But I was her puppet. She pulled the strings.
translation.zh: 但我只是她的木偶 她控制着我

translation.en: I didn't know there was another way
translation.zh: 我不知道还有别的方式

translation.en: till I found Alice.
translation.zh: 直到我遇见爱丽丝

translation.en: Now, she'd seen me coming, of course.
translation.zh: 她当然也预见到我的出现了

translation.en: You kept me waiting long enough.
translation.zh: 你让我等了好久

translation.en: My apologies, ma'am.
translation.zh: 抱歉 小姐

translation.en: I don't know what I'd have become without her.
translation.zh:
我不知道如果没有遇见爱丽丝
我会变成什么样

translation.en: You never have to be that again.
translation.zh: 你永远都不用再那样了

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: The intruder,
translation.zh: 入侵者

translation.en: the newborn army,
translation.zh: 新生儿吸血鬼军队

translation.en: they're all her puppets.
translation.zh: 他们都是她的玩偶

translation.en: Victoria.
translation.zh: 维多利亚

translation.en: Alice would have seen if she wanted to make an army.
translation.zh: 如果她想制造大军 爱丽丝会看到的

translation.en: Unless she's hiding behind them
translation.zh: 除非她躲在幕后

translation.en: and she's letting someone else decide.
translation.zh: 让别人来替她做这个决定

translation.en: Welcome to the army.
translation.zh: 欢迎加入吸血鬼大军

translation.en: I'm not just gonna hide while you're out taking all the risks for me.
translation.zh: 我不能在你们为我冒险的时候躲起来

translation.en: If it's Victoria involved,
translation.zh: 如果此事与维多利亚有关

translation.en: I need to keep you as far away from the fight as possible.
translation.zh: 我必须尽量让你远离恶战

translation.en: Jasper said that I could be of help.
translation.zh: 贾斯帕之前说我或许能帮得上忙

translation.en: We won't need your help.
translation.zh: 我们不需要你的帮忙

translation.en: With the wolves in this, it's an easy win.
translation.zh: 有狼人的参与 我们可以轻松获胜

translation.en: The rest of us aren't gonna have enough to do.
translation.zh: 我们其他人都没什么可做的

translation.en: Okay. Either it's so dangerous that I have to hide
translation.zh:
好吧 你又说情况太危险
我必须躲起来 又说胜算在握 你们都无事可干

translation.en: or it's so easy that you're gonna be sidelined. Which is it?
translation.zh: 又说胜算在握 你们都无事可干 到底是哪种？

translation.en: It's dangerous for you, it's easy for us.
translation.zh: 对你来说很危险 对我们来说很轻松

translation.en: I think it's dangerous for us to be apart.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们分开了才叫危险

translation.en: How many times do we have to prove that?
translation.zh: 事实已经验证了很多次 还不够吗？

translation.en: I'll be worried. You'll be worried.
translation.zh: 我会担心 你也会担心

translation.en: And we'll both be more vulnerable.
translation.zh: 我们都会变得更加脆弱不堪

translation.en: Okay, you're right.
translation.zh: 好吧 你说得对

translation.en: So I'm coming with you.
translation.zh: 所以我要跟你一起去

translation.en: No, we both stay away together.
translation.zh: 不 我们待在一起 都不去战场

translation.en: I can't make you choose between me and your family.
translation.zh:
我不能让你
在我和你的家庭之间做选择

translation.en: The only way I can protect you is to be with you.
translation.zh:
和你在一起
是我可以保护你的唯一方法

translation.en: [Jacob] You're not fighting?
translation.zh: 你们没练习战斗吗？

translation.en: What, did you pull a muscle or something?
translation.zh: 是肌肉拉伤了还是怎么了？

translation.en: He's doing it for me, okay? Whatever.
translation.zh:
-他是为了我
-随便吧

translation.en: Just tell me the plan.
translation.zh: 把安排告诉我吧

translation.en: This field will give us an advantage in battle.
translation.zh: 此地做战场 会让我们占尽地利

translation.en: We need to lure the newborns with Bella's scent,
translation.zh:
我们先利用贝拉的气味
把那些新生儿引过来

translation.en: but it needs to end here.
translation.zh: 然后一切必须在这里终结

translation.en: Edward and I are going to a campsite.
translation.zh: 爱德华和我去营地

translation.en: Even if he carries me, they'll still pick up on our scents.
translation.zh:
即使由他背着我
他们还是能闻到我的气味

translation.en: Your stench, however, is revolting.
translation.zh: 但是 你身上的臭味 则令人反感

translation.en: Dude, you really don't wanna start comparing stinks.
translation.zh:
老兄 要比身上的臭味
谁比得过你们？

translation.en: What he means is that your scent will mask mine if you carry me.
translation.zh:
他的意思是 如果由你来背着我
你身上的气味会遮盖住我的

translation.en: Done.
translation.zh: 成交

translation.en: This is not a good idea.
translation.zh: 这不是个好主意

translation.en: Edward, they won't want to get anywhere near his odor.
translation.zh: 爱德华 他们不会想接近他的…体味的

translation.en: Okay. Let's just try it.
translation.zh: 好了 我们来试一下

translation.en: Eau de wolf coming up. Run.
translation.zh:
-追上来吧
-跑吧

translation.en: So you gonna ask me to sit out of the fight, too?
translation.zh: 你也想让我不要参战吗？

translation.en: Or don't you care about my safety?
translation.zh: 还是说你根本不在乎我的安危？

translation.en: Of course, I care. But you'd say no.
translation.zh: 我当然在乎 但你不会同意的

translation.en: So I won't have a choice, anyways.
translation.zh: 所以我根本没有选择

translation.en: Since I let Sam be alpha male,
translation.zh: 自从我让山姆成为头狼

translation.en: I gotta live with the shots he calls.
translation.zh: 我就听从他的领导

translation.en: Since you let Sam be alpha?
translation.zh: 是你让山姆成为头狼的吗？

translation.en: I didn't wanna be in a pack, let alone be its leader.
translation.zh: 我根本不想在狼群中生活 更别说做他们的头领了

translation.en: Chief Jacob. Opted out.
translation.zh:
-头狼雅各布
-退出了

translation.en: But every choice has its consequences.
translation.zh: 但是每个选择都有对应的结果

translation.en: Some more than others. Don't start.
translation.zh:
-不过某些选择的后果更严重
-那就别说了

translation.en: Everybody makes choices. You're gonna have to accept mine.
translation.zh:
每个人都会做选择
你必须接受我的选择

translation.en: But you can love more than one person at a time.
translation.zh: 你可以同时爱上不止一个人

translation.en: I've seen it. With Sam, Emily and Leah.
translation.zh: 我见到过 就像山姆 艾米莉和丽娅那样

translation.en: Well, I'm not a wolf. I can't imprint.
translation.zh: 我不是狼人 我无法选择烙印爱人

translation.en: It has nothing to do with imprinting.
translation.zh: 那跟烙印没关系

translation.en: It has to do with feeling something for somebody.
translation.zh: 重点在于 对某人有感觉

translation.en: And I know you feel something for me.
translation.zh: 我知道你对我有感觉

translation.en: I can sense how I make you feel, physically.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到我对你的影响 身体上的变化

translation.en: I make you nervous.
translation.zh: 我让你紧张了

translation.en: Jake.
translation.zh: 雅各

translation.en: Don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: I promised I wouldn't kiss you again till you asked.
translation.zh:
我保证过不再吻你的
除非你主动要求

translation.en: You're gonna be keeping that promise for a while, Chief.
translation.zh: 那你这个承诺得持续很久了 头狼

translation.en: All I picked up was wolf stench. No Bella.
translation.zh: 我只闻到狼的臭味 没有贝拉的气味

translation.en: This will work.
translation.zh:
-这个方法行得通
-很好

translation.en: Okay, Alice, don't be a stranger.
translation.zh:
-爱丽丝 常来做客
-好

translation.en: Your alibi for the battle is all arranged.
translation.zh: 我已经帮你搞定了离家的借口

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: I told your father that our whole family's going camping this weekend,
translation.zh: 我告诉你爸我们全家周末要去野营

translation.en: so you and I are having a sleepover at my house.
translation.zh: 所以你会去我家和我一起住一晚

translation.en: Charlie's going fishing, anyway. Charlie?
translation.zh:
-反正查理要去钓鱼
-查理吗？

translation.en: You guys are on first name basis now?
translation.zh: 你们已经熟到这种程度了吗？

translation.en: Me, he likes.
translation.zh: 他喜欢我

translation.en: Actually, you and Edward will have the house to yourself tonight.
translation.zh: 实际上 今晚只有你和爱德华在家

translation.en: Like alone?
translation.zh: 孤男寡女吗？

translation.en: We're all going hunting. Powering up for the battle.
translation.zh: 我们都要出去猎食 为战斗补充体能

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不用谢

translation.en: Hey. You want a sandwich? No, I'm good.
translation.zh:
-你想吃个三明治吗？
-不用了

translation.en: Well, the sister, I like.
translation.zh: 我倒是喜欢他姐姐

translation.en: Alice. Yeah, she's great.
translation.zh: 她叫爱丽丝 她人很好

translation.en: Hey, Dad, I was wondering.
translation.zh: 爸 我在想…

translation.en: Why didn't you get remarried? After Mom.
translation.zh: 你跟妈妈离婚后 为何没有再婚？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Guess I still haven't met the right gal.
translation.zh: 我想是因为还没遇到合适的人吧

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh:
-怎么了？
-我随口问问

translation.en: I thought you just maybe gave up on the whole institution of it,
translation.zh: 我以为你只是… 或许你已经完全放弃这个念头了

translation.en: of marriage.
translation.zh: 婚姻的念头

translation.en: But do you think there's any value in it?
translation.zh: 你觉得婚姻有价值吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, marriage has value.
translation.zh: 当然了 婚姻是有价值的

translation.en: When you're older. Much older.
translation.zh:
你年纪再大些的时候
比现在大得多时

translation.en: Like your mother.
translation.zh: 就像你妈妈那样

translation.en: It seemed to work out fine for her the second time around,
translation.zh: 离婚后似乎过得很好

translation.en: later in life. Yeah, I guess.
translation.zh:
-人生中的晚些时候
-是啊 也许吧

translation.en: I mean, you definitely don't wanna have to get married because you weren't...
translation.zh: 我是说 你绝对不想因为“做事”不小心 而被迫结婚

translation.en: careful.
translation.zh: 而被迫结婚

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Look, you know what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 你知道我在说什么

translation.en: There's things that you need to think about
translation.zh: 如果你们的身体接触比较亲密的话

translation.en: if you're gonna be physically intimate.
translation.zh: 有些事你必须做好安排

translation.en: Okay. Don't have "the talk" with me, please.
translation.zh: 好了 关于性的对话就到此为止吧

translation.en: Well, it's just as embarrassing for me as it is for you.
translation.zh:
-快别说了
-我也很尴尬 -就跟你一样
-我看未必吧

translation.en: I doubt that.
translation.zh:
-就跟你一样
-我看未必吧

translation.en: And don't bother, 'cause Mom beat you to it like ten years ago.
translation.zh:
你就不必说了
妈妈十年前就跟我谈过了

translation.en: Well, you didn't have a boyfriend ten years ago.
translation.zh: 十年前你可没有男朋友

translation.en: I'm sure things work the same way.
translation.zh: 我觉得这都是…一样的

translation.en: All right, so...
translation.zh: 好吧 所以

translation.en: You guys are taking precautions and--
translation.zh: 你们得…采取些防护措施

translation.en: Okay, Dad, please, just don't worry about that.
translation.zh: 好了爸爸 求你别再担心这个了

translation.en: Edward is old school.
translation.zh: 爱德华…是个很传统的人

translation.en: "Old school." Great. What's that? Like, code for something?
translation.zh: 传统 非常好 那是什么 代指什么吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God. Dad. I'm a virgin.
translation.zh: 天啊 老爸 我还是处女

translation.en: Ah... [gibberish] Okay! Good. Glad we covered that.
translation.zh: 好了 去吧 很高兴我们谈了这个

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Virgin.
translation.zh: 处女

translation.en: I'm liking Edward a little bit more now.
translation.zh: 我现在倒对爱德华有些好感了

translation.en: What are you doing outside? What's wrong?
translation.zh: 你在外面干什么呢？怎么了？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: It seems only fair that I be represented, as well.
translation.zh: 似乎只有把这个送给你 才算公平

translation.en: It's really pretty.
translation.zh: 真漂亮

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: There's a bed.
translation.zh: 竟然有一张床呢

translation.en: I thought you might need one to sleep in.
translation.zh: 我觉得你会想要在床上睡的

translation.en: I think an air mattress would have sufficed.
translation.zh: 一个充气垫就可以了

translation.en: Is this too much? No.
translation.zh:
-是我做的太过了吗？
-不是

translation.en: No, it's perfect.
translation.zh: 不 这样很好

translation.en: I wanna ask you something.
translation.zh: 我想问你一些问题

translation.en: Anything.
translation.zh: 随便问

translation.en: Okay, marriage is the condition for you to change me yourself, right?
translation.zh: 好吧 婚姻是你同意 将我转化成吸血鬼的条件 是吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Okay. I wanna negotiate my own condition.
translation.zh: 那好吧 我想跟你商讨一下我的条件

translation.en: Anything you want. It's yours.
translation.zh: 你想要什么都行 都听你的

translation.en: You promise?
translation.zh: 你发誓吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Bella.
translation.zh: 贝拉

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: But you said that you wanted me to have every human experience.
translation.zh: 你说过你想让我拥有一切的人类体验

translation.en: Not ones that will risk killing you.
translation.zh: 像这样可能害死你的就不行

translation.en: You won't.
translation.zh: 你不会害死我的

translation.en: And everyone says once I'm changed
translation.zh: 每个人都说 一旦我转化后

translation.en: all I'm gonna want is to slaughter the whole town.
translation.zh: 我唯一想做的事就是血洗整个小镇

translation.en: That part doesn't last forever.
translation.zh: 那种情况不会持续太久

translation.en: I want you.
translation.zh: 我想要你

translation.en: While I'm still me. While I still want you this way.
translation.zh: 趁着我还是人类的时候 趁着我想这样要你的时候

translation.en: It's too dangerous.
translation.zh: 太危险了

translation.en: Try. Just try.
translation.zh: 试试吧 试试就好

translation.en: I'll go to some ridiculously expensive college
translation.zh: 我会去个学费超级贵的大学

translation.en: -and let you buy me a car. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 并且逼你给我买辆车

translation.en: I'll marry you. Just try.
translation.zh: 我会嫁给你 试试吧

translation.en: Stop trying to take your clothes off.
translation.zh: 不要把衣服脱下来

translation.en: You wanna do that part? Not tonight.
translation.zh:
-你想自己来
-今晚不行

translation.en: You mean, you don't...
translation.zh: 好吧 你不想…

translation.en: [sighing] That's fine.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Believe me, I want to.
translation.zh: 相信我 我很想

translation.en: I just want to be married to you first.
translation.zh: 我只是想先结婚

translation.en: You really make me feel like I'm some sort of villain
translation.zh: 你真让我觉得我是个荡妇

translation.en: trying to steal your virtue or something.
translation.zh: 想夺走你的贞操什么的

translation.en: It's not my virtue I'm concerned about.
translation.zh: 我担心的不是我的贞操

translation.en: Are you kidding?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: It's just one rule I wanna leave unbroken.
translation.zh: 我不想破坏这个原则

translation.en: It might be too late for my soul, but I will protect yours.
translation.zh:
我的灵魂或许已经失去
但我想守护你的灵魂

translation.en: I know that's not a modern notion.
translation.zh:
-我知道这不是个现代观念
-真的不是

translation.en: It's not modern. It's ancient.
translation.zh:
-我知道这不是个现代观念
-真的不是 简直是老古董

translation.en: I'm from a different era.
translation.zh: 我来自一个不同的时代

translation.en: Things were a lot less complicated.
translation.zh: 一切都…没有这么复杂

translation.en: And if I'd have met you back then, I would have courted you.
translation.zh: 如果那时我遇见你 我会向你求爱

translation.en: We'd have taken chaperoned strolls and iced tea on the porch.
translation.zh: 我们会一起悠闲地散步 或是在走廊上喝冰茶

translation.en: I may have stolen a kiss or two.
translation.zh: 我或许会窃取一两个香吻

translation.en: But only after asking your father's permission.
translation.zh: 但 只会… 在征得你父亲的同意之后

translation.en: I would have got down on one knee...
translation.zh: 我会单腿下跪

translation.en: and I would have presented you with a ring.
translation.zh: 然后献上一枚戒指

translation.en: This was my mother's.
translation.zh: 这曾是我母亲的戒指

translation.en: Isabella Swan, I promise to love you every moment of forever.
translation.zh:
伊莎贝拉·斯旺
我发誓我会永远爱你

translation.en: And would you do me the extraordinary honor of marrying me?
translation.zh: 你是否愿意赐我殊荣 嫁我为妻？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: You're not coming with us?
translation.zh: 你不跟我们一起吗？

translation.en: It'll be a last-minute decision.
translation.zh: 我会临时起意再亲临战场的

translation.en: I told you how it works.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你相关的情况

translation.en: The Cullens have powers.
translation.zh: 卡伦家族有着神奇的力量

translation.en: Don't underestimate them, Riley.
translation.zh: 别低估他们 莱利

translation.en: You'll have the numbers,
translation.zh: 你在数量上占优势

translation.en: but they'll be able to anticipate your every move.
translation.zh: 但是他们能够 预见你每一步

translation.en: According to your friend? Yes.
translation.zh:
-你朋友这么说的吗？
-是啊

translation.en: My dead friend.
translation.zh: 我那死去的朋友

translation.en: Laurent found out about the things they could do,
translation.zh: 劳伦特发现了他们的超能力

translation.en: and they killed him.
translation.zh: 他们就杀了他

translation.en: But not before he told me.
translation.zh: 但他在死之前告诉了我

translation.en: Maybe he was wrong.
translation.zh: 也许他错了

translation.en: I mean, this is supposed to be Cullen territory.
translation.zh: 我是说 这里应该是 卡伦家族的领地

translation.en: We've been tearing it up and I've never even seen them here.
translation.zh:
我们肆意妄为了这么久
却从未见他们的身影

translation.en: You don't trust me.
translation.zh: 你不相信我

translation.en: With my life. I'm just saying--
translation.zh: 我可以把命都交给你 我只是说

translation.en: I'm doing this for us.
translation.zh:
我这样做是为了我们
那样我们可以有血喝

translation.en: So that we can feed without their retaliation.
translation.zh:
我这样做是为了我们
那样我们可以有血喝 而不用担心他们的报复

translation.en: I can't live in fear anymore, waiting for them to attack.
translation.zh: 我再也无法生活在恐惧中了 坐以待毙

translation.en: I won't let them.
translation.zh: 我不会允许他们动你的

translation.en: I am going to end the Cullen clan.
translation.zh: 我现在就去毁灭卡伦家族

translation.en: I swear.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: I love you so much.
translation.zh: 我爱你 爱极了

translation.en: You're going overboard.
translation.zh: 你这样做太过了吧？

translation.en: If this is all I can contribute, I wanna be thorough.
translation.zh:
如果我只能帮到这一点
我希望能做到底

translation.en: The newborns'll be frantic.
translation.zh: 新生儿们会为你的血抓狂的

translation.en: It's okay. Don't make yourself uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 没事 你别找罪受了

translation.en: It doesn't bother me anymore.
translation.zh: 我已经不会为此抓狂了

translation.en: Since when?
translation.zh: 从何时开始的？

translation.en: Since I spent 24 hours thinking you were dead.
translation.zh:
自从我以为你死了
度过的那24小时开始

translation.en: You're not wearing your ring.
translation.zh: 你没带戒指

translation.en: Well, I didn't want to risk losing it.
translation.zh: 我不希望不小心给弄丢了

translation.en: Or risk Jacob seeing it.
translation.zh: 或是怕雅各布看见吧

translation.en: I think we should wait to tell him.
translation.zh: 我觉得应该等等再告诉他

translation.en: I mean, at least till after the fight.
translation.zh: 至少等这场恶战之后

translation.en: If you're having second thoughts-- I'm not.
translation.zh:
-如果你后悔了…
-不 我没有

translation.en: I just want him to have a clear head.
translation.zh: 我只是希望他能集中精力应战

translation.en: Whose head is unclear?
translation.zh: 谁没集中精神啊？

translation.en: Nobody's I hope.
translation.zh: 我希望没人

translation.en: Alice says there's a storm coming.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝说风暴要来临了

translation.en: Yeah, I can feel it. We should get going.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到 我们该走了

translation.en: I'll see you in a couple of hours.
translation.zh: 几小时后见

translation.en: Something up?
translation.zh: 出什么事了吗？

translation.en: Bunch of vampires trying to kill me.
translation.zh: 一群吸血鬼想杀了我

translation.en: Same old, same old.
translation.zh: 旧事重演

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You should get back before the storm hits.
translation.zh: 暴风雪就要来了 你快回去吧

translation.en: No, I'm staying.
translation.zh: 不 我留下

translation.en: You'll need my connection
translation.zh: 我和狼群的心理感应可以帮上很大忙

translation.en: to the pack to keep tabs on what's going on.
translation.zh: 密切关注战斗情况

translation.en: You're not gonna fight? Seth will spell me in the morning.
translation.zh:
-你不参加战斗了吗？
-赛斯明早会来接替我

translation.en: He's not happy about missing the action,
translation.zh: 他不开心错过了大战

translation.en: but it'll keep him out of trouble.
translation.zh: 但这样能让他免于陷入麻烦

translation.en: Let's get you inside.
translation.zh: 你还是进去吧

translation.en: I should have chosen a site lower down.
translation.zh: 我真该找个低一点的地方的

translation.en: No, it's fine. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 不 我没事

translation.en: What can I do?
translation.zh: 我能为你做什么？

translation.en: I can't sleep with all that teeth chattering going on.
translation.zh: 她牙齿冻得直打架 我可睡不着

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.zh: 你别痴心妄想了

translation.en: She may need her toes someday.
translation.zh:
她的脚趾冻坏了可就糟了
承认事实吧

translation.en: And let's face it, I am hotter than you.
translation.zh: 我比你温暖

translation.en: Get your hand off me.
translation.zh: 把手拿开

translation.en: Keep your hands off her.
translation.zh: 你不许碰她

translation.en: Don't fight.
translation.zh: 别打架

translation.en: If she gets sick, it's on you.
translation.zh: 她如果病了 都算你的错

translation.en: Wow, you're freezing, Bella.
translation.zh: 你都冻僵了 贝拉

translation.en: Relax. You'll warm up soon.
translation.zh: 放松 马上就能暖起来

translation.en: Faster if you took your clothes off.
translation.zh: 如果你脱掉衣服 则会更快

translation.en: Jake. Survival 101.
translation.zh:
-雅各
-《幸存者基本常识》里说的

translation.en: Can you at least attempt to control your thoughts?
translation.zh: 你能不能试着控制下你的无耻想法？

translation.en: I really get under that ice-cold skin of yours, don't I?
